tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_warranty (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_make VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  vehicle_model VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  warranty_provider VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  warranty_coverage TEXT,
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
   vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   make VARCHAR(50),
   model VARCHAR(50),
   year INT,
   vin VARCHAR(17)
);

CREATE TABLE warranties (
   warranty_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id UUID, 
   coverage_details TEXT,
   expiration_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    warranty_provider VARCHAR(100),
    coverage_details TEXT,
    expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE warranty_coverage (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE warranty_expiration (
    expiration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    warranty_provider VARCHAR(255),
    warranty_coverage_details VARCHAR(500),
    warranty_expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WarrantyProviders (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE WarrantyCoverage (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_details VARCHAR(500),
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_length INT
)

CREATE TABLE VehiclesWarranty (
    vehicle_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    coverage_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicles(vehicle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES WarrantyProviders(provider_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (coverage_id) REFERENCES WarrantyCoverage(coverage_id)
)
